description: top-level batch voucher, i.e. a collection of batched vouchers

batchGroup.description: The human-readable name of the batch group used when generating this batch voucher

batchedVouchers.description: an array of batched voucher records

created.description: When this batch voucher was created

start.description: This export is for all vouchers between start and end

end.description: This export is for all vouchers between start and end

totalRecords.description: total number of records in the array
